name: @repo/plugins-amx
description: HLStatsNext AMX Mod X Plugin for enhanced game server messaging

scripts.compile:plugin: echo 'AMX Mod X compiler (amxxpc) required - install from https://www.amxmodx.org/downloads-new.php'
scripts.dev: pnpm run compile && pnpm run deploy:dev
scripts.deploy:dev: echo 'Deploy to test server: cp compiled/hlstatsnext.amxx /path/to/server/addons/amxmodx/plugins/'
scripts.lint: echo 'Pawn linting not configured - consider using manual code review'
scripts.validate: echo 'Validation requires AMX Mod X compiler'
